author: Eli Rosenberg
title: Democrats say gun carrying in Michigan’s capitol is a workplace hazard
description: Visitors are not allowed to carry signs in the state's capitol, but they can carry guns. Democrats say they are increasingly concerned with the safety of their workplace.
content: Now, Democratic legislators in Michigan are redoubling their attempts to prevent visitors from carrying firearms into the Capitol. They are using a somewhat novel argument about workplace safety, say… [+4076 chars]
